name: Skatezz
description:
a game i made while i was offline for half a month

CONTROLS
  • LEFT AND RIGHT ARROWS to move
  • UP ARROW to jump
  • DOWN ARROW to duck
  • Z/ENTER to select
  • ESC to go back
MORE TO COME!!

CUTSCENES, DIAOGUE, STORY, NEW MECHANICS, PLAYABLE CHARCTERS AND SO MUCH MORE
